scenes.description: A cinematic segment where Gigi Murin is chased and run over by a horse carriage in a dark tunnel.
A loading screen featuring Gigi and her mascots.
A bright sun with a human face laughs maniacally over a suburban house scene.
Gigi wakes up on the floor of a house, confused by her surroundings.
Hakos Baelz and Koseki Bijou play a Sims-like game called 'The Gimms,' controlling Gigi's character.

subtitles.original: Eh?
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: Is there something?
subtitles.english: Is there something?

subtitles.original: No, no, please! No! Don't do it! No! Ahhh!
subtitles.english: No, no, please! No! Don't do it! No! Ahhh!

subtitles.original: Owly...
subtitles.english: Owly...

subtitles.original: Ow!
subtitles.english: Ow!

subtitles.original: Why does this keep happening to me?
subtitles.english: Why does this keep happening to me?

subtitles.original: Where am I?
subtitles.english: Where am I?

subtitles.original: What is this?
subtitles.english: What is this?

subtitles.original: This isn't my fantasy life.
subtitles.english: This isn't my fantasy life.

subtitles.original: House?
subtitles.english: House?

subtitles.original: Where am I going?
subtitles.english: Where am I going?

subtitles.original: What is- ah!
subtitles.english: What is- ah!

subtitles.original: Hey, what's up, how's it going guys?
subtitles.english: Hey, what's up, how's it going guys?

subtitles.original: Oh my gosh, what's up?
subtitles.english: Oh my gosh, what's up?

subtitles.original: What's up everyone?
subtitles.english: What's up everyone?

subtitles.original: My name is Bae!
subtitles.english: My name is Bae!

subtitles.original: And my name is Biboo!
subtitles.english: And my name is Biboo!

subtitles.original: And together we are... BAEBIBOO!
subtitles.english: And together we are... BAEBIBOO!

subtitles.original: Welcome, welcome to our Let's Play!
subtitles.english: Welcome, welcome to our Let's Play!

subtitles.original: Yes, today we are playing a new game called...
subtitles.english: Yes, today we are playing a new game called...

subtitles.original: ...what is it called?
subtitles.english: ...what is it called?

subtitles.original: Uh, Gimms? The Gimm?
subtitles.english: Uh, Gimms? The Gimm?

subtitles.original: The Gimms? The Gimms?
subtitles.english: The Gimms? The Gimms?

subtitles.original: I don't know how it's pronounced.
subtitles.english: I don't know how it's pronounced.

subtitles.original: Something like that. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Something like that. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Um, it's a brand new game with the rat...
subtitles.english: Um, it's a brand new game with the rat...

subtitles.original: ...look at my move! The alpha!
subtitles.english: ...look at my move! The alpha!

subtitles.original: We are the first ones to touch it.
subtitles.english: We are the first ones to touch it.

subtitles.original: Thank you, Sak-chan!
subtitles.english: Thank you, Sak-chan!

subtitles.original: So we've got exclusive footage here...
subtitles.english: So we've got exclusive footage here...

subtitles.original: ...for you today. Let's get started!
subtitles.english: ...for you today. Let's get started!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much! Let's get started!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! Let's get started!

subtitles.original: So the premise of this game is we've got our character...
subtitles.english: So the premise of this game is we've got our character...

subtitles.original: Where are you guys at? What are you doing over there?
subtitles.english: Where are you guys at? What are you doing over there?

subtitles.original: ...Gigi. Gigi. Is it a Gigi or Gigi?
subtitles.english: ...Gigi. Gigi. Is it a Gigi or Gigi?

subtitles.original: Biboo!
subtitles.english: Biboo!

subtitles.original: I probably- I don't know.
subtitles.english: I probably- I don't know.

subtitles.original: And it's kind of like a real-life simulator game.
subtitles.english: And it's kind of like a real-life simulator game.

subtitles.original: So if I push this button right here...
subtitles.english: So if I push this button right here...

subtitles.original: ...she should be able to sit down.
subtitles.english: ...she should be able to sit down.

subtitles.original: Let's see. Oh, there we go!
subtitles.english: Let's see. Oh, there we go!

subtitles.original: Wait! I didn't do that!
subtitles.english: Wait! I didn't do that!

subtitles.original: Whoa! The controls!
subtitles.english: Whoa! The controls!

subtitles.original: Let's- let's test them some more.
subtitles.english: Let's- let's test them some more.

subtitles.original: Let's test out the controls.
subtitles.english: Let's test out the controls.

subtitles.original: Can you make her sit on the sofa?
subtitles.english: Can you make her sit on the sofa?

subtitles.original: Um, let's see if she can act like a dog.
subtitles.english: Um, let's see if she can act like a dog.

subtitles.original: You've got that dog in you!
subtitles.english: You've got that dog in you!

subtitles.original: You've got the dog in you! Of course!
subtitles.english: You've got the dog in you! Of course!

subtitles.original: Of course people would make me act like a dog.
subtitles.english: Of course people would make me act like a dog.

subtitles.original: There's the button! Bar- bar- bark!
subtitles.english: There's the button! Bar- bar- bark!

subtitles.original: Louder!
subtitles.english: Louder!

subtitles.original: Whoa, look at those physics!
subtitles.english: Whoa, look at those physics!

subtitles.original: Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Oh my god!

subtitles.original: Okay, that's enough.
subtitles.english: Okay, that's enough.

subtitles.original: Okay, stand back up.
subtitles.english: Okay, stand back up.

subtitles.original: All right, stand back up.
subtitles.english: All right, stand back up.

subtitles.original: So this is just the base game, right?
subtitles.english: So this is just the base game, right?

subtitles.original: So, you know, there's the- this is the room.
subtitles.english: So, you know, there's the- this is the room.

subtitles.original: Wait, something weird's going on.
subtitles.english: Wait, something weird's going on.

subtitles.original: Have you noticed? Something's weird.
subtitles.english: Have you noticed? Something's weird.

subtitles.original: So there's four rooms at the moment.
subtitles.english: So there's four rooms at the moment.

subtitles.original: We've got the main living room, the bedroom...
subtitles.english: We've got the main living room, the bedroom...

subtitles.original: ...and the bathroom.
subtitles.english: ...and the bathroom.

subtitles.original: And I think there's a kitchen- attached kitchenette.
subtitles.english: And I think there's a kitchen- attached kitchenette.

subtitles.original: Should we go check out the kitchen?
subtitles.english: Should we go check out the kitchen?

subtitles.original: Yeah, let's go see the kitchen! My character!
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's go see the kitchen! My character!

subtitles.original: Move into the kitchen. Come on, Gigi!
subtitles.english: Move into the kitchen. Come on, Gigi!

subtitles.original: I don't want to! I don't want to!
subtitles.english: I don't want to! I don't want to!

subtitles.original: Stop, I don't want to!
subtitles.english: Stop, I don't want to!

subtitles.original: Let's see any- anything we can interact with.
subtitles.english: Let's see any- anything we can interact with.

subtitles.original: Oh look, a knife!
subtitles.english: Oh look, a knife!

subtitles.original: Pick up the knife! Pick it up right now!
subtitles.english: Pick up the knife! Pick it up right now!

subtitles.original: What does she have? A knife!
subtitles.english: What does she have? A knife!

subtitles.original: Pick up a knife! Pick up a knife!
subtitles.english: Pick up a knife! Pick up a knife!

subtitles.original: Pick it up! Pick it up! Pick it up!
subtitles.english: Pick it up! Pick it up! Pick it up!

subtitles.original: Why is there so much input lag? I know!
subtitles.english: Why is there so much input lag? I know!

subtitles.original: Why is input- oh, there we go! There we go!
subtitles.english: Why is input- oh, there we go! There we go!

subtitles.original: Maybe the connection's just a little bit slow.
subtitles.english: Maybe the connection's just a little bit slow.

subtitles.original: That's fine.
subtitles.english: That's fine.

subtitles.original: Now, okay. Now what? You're going to...
subtitles.english: Now, okay. Now what? You're going to...

subtitles.original: ...put the knife into the stove?
subtitles.english: ...put the knife into the stove?

subtitles.original: Yes, into the stove! Into the burning hot stove!
subtitles.english: Yes, into the stove! Into the burning hot stove!

subtitles.original: I hope she doesn't stab herself.
subtitles.english: I hope she doesn't stab herself.

subtitles.original: Geez, do you think they, uh, accounted for this...
subtitles.english: Geez, do you think they, uh, accounted for this...

subtitles.original: ...kind of- oh my god!
subtitles.english: ...kind of- oh my god!

subtitles.original: Maybe that's something they can add...
subtitles.english: Maybe that's something they can add...

subtitles.original: ...in the next update. That was kind of anticlimactic.
subtitles.english: ...in the next update. That was kind of anticlimactic.

subtitles.original: Oh well.
subtitles.english: Oh well.

subtitles.original: Whoa! Okay, pick up knife again.
subtitles.english: Whoa! Okay, pick up knife again.

subtitles.original: Why? Why?
subtitles.english: Why? Why?

subtitles.original: Pick up knife! Always carry a knife.
subtitles.english: Pick up knife! Always carry a knife.

subtitles.original: All right. What are you guys doing to me?
subtitles.english: All right. What are you guys doing to me?

subtitles.original: Shall we move into another room?
subtitles.english: Shall we move into another room?

subtitles.original: Yeah, let's check out the other room.
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's check out the other room.

subtitles.original: Let's go into door number one! Let's see what's in there.
subtitles.english: Let's go into door number one! Let's see what's in there.

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: Walk! Walk forward! Go! Move!
subtitles.english: Walk! Walk forward! Go! Move!

subtitles.original: Walk! Walk! Go! Move! Move!
subtitles.english: Walk! Walk! Go! Move! Move!

subtitles.original: There she goes! Whoo! What is in that door?
subtitles.english: There she goes! Whoo! What is in that door?

subtitles.original: Oh, she just clipped through the wall.
subtitles.english: Oh, she just clipped through the wall.

subtitles.original: Oh, she clipped! Oh, we've got to report that bug.
subtitles.english: Oh, she clipped! Oh, we've got to report that bug.

subtitles.original: Oh, clip! Okay, we've got to report that bug.
subtitles.english: Oh, clip! Okay, we've got to report that bug.

subtitles.original: That's right.
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh, there's a bathtub! And there's a toilet!
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh, there's a bathtub! And there's a toilet!

subtitles.original: Oh, there's a bathtub! And there's a toilet!
subtitles.english: Oh, there's a bathtub! And there's a toilet!

subtitles.original: Oh, oh, there's a- I know, I know!
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, there's a- I know, I know!

subtitles.original: Have you heard of Skibidi Toilet?
subtitles.english: Have you heard of Skibidi Toilet?

subtitles.original: Oh gosh, what is Skibidi Toilet?
subtitles.english: Oh gosh, what is Skibidi Toilet?

subtitles.original: All right, I'm going to make the character...
subtitles.english: All right, I'm going to make the character...

subtitles.original: ...phase into the toilet...
subtitles.english: ...phase into the toilet...

subtitles.original: ...with her head sticking out to become...
subtitles.english: ...with her head sticking out to become...

subtitles.original: ...Skibidi! Become one with the toilet! NOW!
subtitles.english: ...Skibidi! Become one with the toilet! NOW!

subtitles.original: I don't want to! No! No!
subtitles.english: I don't want to! No! No!

subtitles.original: Skibidi Toilet! I learn something new every day.
subtitles.english: Skibidi Toilet! I learn something new every day.

subtitles.original: Skibidi bop bop bop! Yes, yes, yes!
subtitles.english: Skibidi bop bop bop! Yes, yes, yes!
